name: Zorb
description:
Zorb is an endless arcade game where you control a barrier that surrounds an energy core. 

Your objective is to protect the core for as long as possible by absorbing bullets and enemies that attack!

This game was made for the ScoreSpace #20 Game Jam in 72 hours.

Controls D, Right-Arrow, Right-Click (Hold)Rotate ClockwiseA , Left-Arrow, Left-Click (Hold)Rotate Counter-ClockwiseLeft-ClickInteract (UI)Mouse HoverPick up powerups

DO YOU HAVE WHAT IT TAKES TO MAKE IT IN THE TOP 10 LEADERBOARD?
